content: we think tiny knits are the best knits enjoy this free pattern for thumb-less baby mittens from we knit together it is great way to use up dk yarn scraps very quick knit that will keep your baby s hands nice and toasty great pattern for baby shower gift materials yarn dk weight needles us size 4 3 5 mm dpns us size 6 4 0 mm dpns notions darning needle and measuring tape gauge 5 sts and 8 row per inch in stockinette on size 6 needles 1 skein of yarn or scraps
